summary: Frontend testing completed for Dashboard Tasks Widget, SLA Notification Service, and component structure verification. All features working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 404 - workspace endpoint not found (non-critical, app works without it)

critical_code_review_comments: DashboardPage.js line 37: useEffect has missing dependency 'fetchDashboardData' - consider adding eslint-disable comment or wrapping in useCallback
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard Tasks Widget and SLA Notification Service are fully functional. Component extraction for leads and pipeline completed successfully.

tests: Today's Tasks widget appears on dashboard
Shows SLA breaches count (6 SLA Breaches)
Tasks listed with priority badges (high, urgent, medium)
View All button navigates to /tasks page
Toast shows deal name and breach details
My Tasks tab shows overdue (4), due today (1), upcoming (2)
All Tasks tab shows task list with filters
SLA Monitor tab shows Compliant (2), At Risk (0), Breached (6)
SLA Breaches section shows immediate action items
New Task button opens create dialog
Create dialog has Title, Description, Type, Priority, Due Date fields
Tasks & SLAs nav item navigates to /tasks
Partner Config nav item navigates to /partner-config
